name: BLASTER LiLO
description: Blast through an endless horde of enemies in this survival shoot'em up or compete against other players in a battle for the ultimate score.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Celeron Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: Intel integrated graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 260 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i5 Graphics: GeForce GTX 770 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 260 MB available space
